officialTitle: Photobiomodulation for Breast Cancer Radiodermatitis Prevention. A Randomized Controlled Trial.
conditions: Breast Cancer, Radiodermatitis, Radiotherapy Side Effect, Radiation Dermatitis, Radiation Toxicity, Radiation Injuries, Quality of Life, Breast Neoplasms
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Breast cancer
